alert.note: Alert for Meade; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 11:54PM CDT until July 21 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tyrone, or 9 miles west of Liberal, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Liberal around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hayne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
